title: Can't Buy Champions

replies.body: I'm having this exact same problem, It won't let me buy anyone that is around the amount IP I currently have. I have 6535 IP and can't buy any of the 6300 champs, but it allows me to purchase anyone lower than 6300.
you have to go to the store page in the launcher

I can't give you free RP, but I can suggest a workaround for this issue! Try logging into the Legacy Client from the login screen, then head to the store to see if you can make the same purchase you were trying before.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked or not!
When I click on Launch Legacy Client... it closes the Alpha client and nothing happens
I can confirm logging into the legacy client did in fact work! Thank you for the help was really stressing after saving 6300IP for the last few weeks.
